flawed_nl_solution:
He runs at .1 miles per minute because 6 / 60 = <<6/60=0.1>>0.1
While the album is playing he can run 4 miles because 40 x 0.1 = <<40*0.1=4>>4
He has to run 2 miles without the album because 6 - 4 = <<6-4=6>>6
Without music he runs 1/15 miles per minute because 4 / 60 = 1/15
He will run the remaining 2 miles in 30 minutes because 6 / (1/15) = <<6/(1/15)=90>>90
It will take him 70 minutes in total because 40 + 90 =<<40+90=130>>130

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2.0, not 6.0. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
